rows.label: tlk41310141_01_msg0001
rows.name:
When accepting a request,
your mindset should be to
put the client first.

rows.label: tlk41310141_01_msg0002
rows.name:
We mercenaries are paid by our
clients to do our work, after all.

rows.label: tlk41310141_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Neglecting or insulting a
client affects the reputation
of the entire Merc Group.

rows.label: tlk41310141_01_msg0004
rows.name:
You might not have a problem, but
it doesn't hurt to remember this.
